item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. What you can get out of a high-quality font (111 points | 35 comments)
3. Google Illuminate: Books and Papers turned into audio content (132 points | 70 comments)

9. Tomato64: A port of Tomato Firmware to x86_64 (46 points | 15 comments)

19. Roame (YC S23) Is Hiring a Chief of Staff ( | hide)

23. How to Compose Math Problems (23 points | 1 comment)
24. Deductive Verification for Chain-of-Thought Reasoning in LLMs (9 points | discuss)

26. Carpentopod: A Walking Table Project (357 points | 41 comments)
27. An NFC movie library for my kids (1227 points | 287 comments)
28. Google loses EU court battle over €2.4B antitrust fine (98 points | 78 comments)
29. The Canary (166 points | 36 comments)
